<<<<<<< HEAD
Jus primogeniti, or, The dignity, right, and priviledge of the first-born inquisited and defended against the impious practice of some fathers in disinheriting their first-begotten son in a letter to a friend in the country / by B.J., Esq. Brydall, John, b. 1635?
8 p.
Printed for R. Battersby, London : 1699.
Caption title. Attributed to John Brydall. Cf. Wing. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

8 p.
Printed for R. Battersby, London : 1699.
Caption title. Attributed to John Brydall. Cf. Wing. Imprint from colophon. Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
